featured.text: Finally, after years of training and intensive workouts, Deborah Duffey was going to compete in her first high school basketball game.

definition.zh_def: 鍛煉身體的活動或運動，通常為了增強體力或改善健康。
definition.en_def: A session of physical exercise or training, typically aimed at improving fitness or health.
definition.example: I go to the gym every morning for my workout.
